website_summaries.verdict: The Linksys EA6400 is a good router, but for its current price, its Wi-Fi performance is rather disappointing.
pros: The Linksys EA6400 Smart Wi-Fi router offers stable Wi-Fi coverage, has a robust cloud-enabled Web interface, and is easy to use and good-looking
cons: The router suffers from short Wi-Fi range, underwhelming wireless speeds, and its comparatively high cost

customer_reviews.title: Newer is not always better
customer_reviews.text: I chose to REPURCHASE this model wireless modem because of past performance and evident durability. The environment that this 6400 modem has been used in is indeed harsh, a back porch (enclosed with plastic against the elements) that gets subjected to both hot and cold (northern michigan extremes) and has never once failed or lost a connection (4 years in service). One user connection is in a house (60' away). Yea this modem is an "older" model but I would buy it again as long as it performs as it has...period
customer_reviews.author: C Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazzard
customer_reviews.text: The electrical plug in adaptor " power source" gets red hot to the touch and the entire unit will turn off due to over heating in the compositor or resister in the plug. When the plug in unplugged at the power source the power plug will cool down. to where you can handle it. when plugged back in the unit will turn back on .
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Getting incredible signal. Using the 5g I’m getting even more mbps than my carrier claims I can get. Using an extender to reach the back of the house but I’m not complaining
customer_reviews.author: ray videc

customer_reviews.title: simple installation
customer_reviews.text: replaced my older linksys wif router with this new one and increased my wifi speeds throughout my entire home
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have researched this router before purchasing, found out the U.S DHS found the linksy EA models (Smart) routers to be extremely venerable to hacker attacks and DDOS..Scary Info to find! Will be returning before I open the amazon box!
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and works wrll
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because of the reasonable price and name brand. Item arrived undamaged and as described. Very easy to install and got it working instantly!
customer_reviews.author: Ayuni

customer_reviews.title: Not very easy to install DD-WRT or similar custom firmware
customer_reviews.text: Not very easy to install DD-WRT or similar custom firmware,overheats easily. Good price/challenge though.Just follow easily obtainable install directions and add a fan to the case...a good sub-50$ option. I am pleased with the product...the seller shipped item very quick...it arrived before schedule.Also pleasing. 87/100
customer_reviews.author: Jared H.

customer_reviews.title: Saves me money every month
customer_reviews.text: It can get hot, but it's a good deal for the money. It's better than giving all your money to the cable company.
customer_reviews.author: C. P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice cheap upgrade, annoying firmware.
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a N single band router. Nice speed and range gains. Dislike the firmware ui and that it forces you to use their app (that loves to ask you to register for no reason). Otherwise no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Josh Rivera

customer_reviews.title: The router was easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: The router was easy to set up. The range is excellent. I have multiple computers, an iPad and smart phone. All connect without issue.
customer_reviews.author: C. Falco

customer_reviews.title: Excellent router
customer_reviews.text: This router performs very well for what I need it for. Easy to set up, very good range, and I have no complaints about the speed. It has a USB 3.0 slot in the back that I keep a hard drive connected to and watching movies from it works well.
customer_reviews.author: M. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great router
customer_reviews.text: Great little router! Simple setup and low profile design. Easy to upgrade and has lots of advanced features without confusing the novice user.
customer_reviews.author: thomps2100

customer_reviews.title: In less than a day the 2. 4GHZ band ...
customer_reviews.text: In less than a day the 2.4GHZ band of this router dropped to 512kbps despite 90mbps coming out of the modem attached to it. Linksys customer support is a joke. I bought this on account of my previous Linksys/Cisco router lasting 7 years. According to Linksys support this is a known issue. That being said, the 5GHZ band worked flawlessly, though most of my devices can only connect to the 2.4GHZ frequency.
customer_reviews.author: Devon W.

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this for a while now with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a while now with no problems. Im a tech and found this to work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Xdjy

customer_reviews.title: parental controls do not work
customer_reviews.text: Fast router, nice speed. But parental controls do not work, not at all, same as many other Linksys models. They may as well sell a saw that can't use sawblades. Money wasted, buy anything else and you'll be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Router With Good Features
customer_reviews.text: Nice router with easy set up. Seems to have plenty of signal strength and speed capability. Streaming video is no problem and very smooth. The only limitations are my broadband speed at times of high usage. This router will handle much more data than my service provides. The configuration is pretty easy. Device priority is easy to assign and works great, too. Overall, it is a good choice for my current needs and probably well into the future.
customer_reviews.author: C. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Fast wireless, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Ac1600 WiFi and gigabit Ethernet are great, and offer great speed. However, this router is unreliable at best. It randomly decides to stop sending packets over WiFi for a few seconds at a time, a few times an hour. This makes it very difficult to play games or download large files over WiFi. Customer service was a mess. They are sending me a new device, but I'm pretty sure I'm just going to sell it. Also annoying that I cannot log into router config on mobile devices without using their terrible app. This is probably the last Linksys product i will buy.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Another good Linksys router
customer_reviews.text: Works great, all device connectivity and security, well designed user interface and family control.
customer_reviews.author: T3kMan

customer_reviews.title: great  quality and very durable device.
customer_reviews.text: very satisfied with this product. Planning to get another one. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Vakhtang Kvantaliani

customer_reviews.title: so much better than my old linksys
customer_reviews.text: so much better than my old linksys. much further range than expected and having the ability to give my daughters friends their own password and not sharing mine is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: hballparks

customer_reviews.title: A Great Router, NOT as a print server.
customer_reviews.text: It worked as a router and worked well, but with one dismal failure -- despite seller literature claims that it would support a USB printer on my home network that included Ubuntu computers, that claim proved misleading -- or false. Upon delivery, setup and configuration, it was determined that this router would not function as stated and it would not function as I desired and needed -- I sent it back. This router WILL NOT function as a LPR Server for a USB printer on a home wireless network. It will, however, serve a printer if you install the app on your Windows or Mac, if you don't mind the time and trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Vintage Vet

customer_reviews.title: This thing was very easy to set up and required very little networking skill
customer_reviews.text: This thing was very easy to set up and required very little networking skill. I ordered this for my parents and my Mom said it took her about 10 minutes to get it up and running
customer_reviews.author: RMM

customer_reviews.title: THis rounter is so so - limited range
customer_reviews.text: no range - returned and bought a better one.. Dont skimp on price for a good router. Get one that has external antennas!
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Always loses connection hard to set up, cannot get it to read my external hard drive so I can stream movies across my network.
customer_reviews.author: Art B

customer_reviews.title: This one seemed like a great one and I'm loving it so far
customer_reviews.text: Needed a wireless router to use with an external Hard Drive with USB port. This one seemed like a great one and I'm loving it so far.
customer_reviews.author: R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great job!
customer_reviews.text: Great job!!! Would very highly recommend. This one replaced a very old tired out router...and I never looked back. This one fixed all my problems and issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needed that gig port to prove I was not getting the speed I was promised.
customer_reviews.author: Mayday63

customer_reviews.title: Quality WI-FI Router at a VERY reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Ever since we opened the Linksys wi-fi router I have been so impressed with the powerful wi-fi signal we get in all of the rooms in out 2000+ sq ft. home and also the great security it provides. I had another brand that was actually supposed to be stronger and never worked as well. I definitely​ recommend this Router for the quality it provides at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to people.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product we are computer savvy didn't need tech support.
customer_reviews.author: Country Girl

customer_reviews.title: Set-up was fairly easy. However
customer_reviews.text: Set-up was fairly easy. However, my devices kept losing connectivity with this router. Had to reboot at least once a day to get things going again. I bought this router for its increased wifi range to cover my 2-story home. After about 1.5 months of dealing with connectivity issues and rebooting the router, this, I went back to my 5-year old Vizio router. I know i'm outside of the 30-day return window with Amazon now..so I guess I'm SOL.
customer_reviews.author: Vu Thieu

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: As Usual. Very useful and easy to install. Only to fallow the indications.
customer_reviews.author: Cesaraom

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again and I would recommend it to a friend in
customer_reviews.text: Does what it needs to do and does it well. I would buy it again and I would recommend it to a friend in need
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: great router for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great router for the price. Works well with no interference.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: It seems like the 5 GHz is a little flaky
customer_reviews.text: I have had some issues with this one as well. It seems like the 5 GHz is a little flaky. I get great speeds when it is working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Got back online fast!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and it hooked up easily. Connected to my 4 devices with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Router for the Money
customer_reviews.text: It serves my purpose. Not as easy to set-up as described. I would recommend this purchase to anyone needing a basis router.
customer_reviews.author: ASH@GA

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. I have to say again a very ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. I have to say again a very good product. My complaint is not with the product. It is with some of the companies and employees who are supposed to be working "with" customers who buy the routers. What a catastrophe! They are pushy and unconcerned about us as clientele. They are strictly oriented toward obtaining money and don't care beans about us. This seems to be an ever more prevalent problem with information technology hardware. Buy the router but be sure you only deal with Linksys personnel. They are service oriented and do an outstanding job taking care of you. BE CAREFUL.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Piece of s%#t - do yourself a favor and don't buy this guys old junk.
customer_reviews.author: Bwv

customer_reviews.title: While the paperwork explained the item was open but new ...
customer_reviews.text: While the paperwork explained the item was open but new, the was no advance warning and I questioned it because the software was open also.
customer_reviews.author: Anton R. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Can't hide SSID
customer_reviews.text: No longer have the option to 'do not broadcast SSID'. Regardless of how effective it may (or may not) be, let the end user decide if it suits his/her needs. I don't care about Smart Wi-fi features such as remote access to the routers settings. In my opinion they are frivolous and will never get used. Again- in my opinion it is also a way to justify inflating the price. You try to separate yourselves from the competition by adding these features, but the average consumer never uses them. I just want a stable router that is fast and reliable. I returned this model.
customer_reviews.author: dan st.john

customer_reviews.title: I like the app I can install on my phone and ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the app I can install on my phone and monitor anywhere in the world but it still doesn't quit have the range or speed I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and worked perfectly straight out of the box. No drop outs and excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W E Neilson

customer_reviews.title: Great router and have had no problems using it
customer_reviews.text: Great router and have had no problems using it. My devices connected under wifi have been able to take advantage of my fast internet speeds previously bottle necked by my router. It does have wireless ac which my other devices are compatible with. A sleek design. The software with the device has been quite useful and the app to control it all has been quite good as well
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Linksys Smart Wi-Fi AC1600 Router (EA6400)
customer_reviews.text: I think the router was okay but it did not work for what I wanted it for. I could not get the technical support that I needed without paying an extra $39.95. I thought that I should have gotten the support I needed included with the purchase. I did not need wireless for a laptap because I do not have one. I needed it for getting NetFlex on my TV. Supposedly this router needed to be reprogrammed which I couldn't do and which I wasn't going to pay extra to have it done.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: hardware specs are awesome! Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: hardware specs are awesome! Cons: I followed the instructions as they were stated. Everything took about 20 minutes. What double my setup time was I unplugged it and plugged it back in. Once I plugged it back in, it complained about no internet. After fiddling with it for a while, I finally just started over and did a manufacturer's reset on it. After that, it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: raxman

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Ease of installation was a breeze. The product works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tony R. Wong

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this router. The range is awful. When I called tech support I spoke to a rude and impatient girl who was able to improve the range slightly but it still doesn't reach over 30 feet and I'm being generous with that estimate. And when I called I was also told that the warranty was up. I had only had it for a few days so I'm not sure what that's about. I wish I had returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Anastazia

customer_reviews.title: Works Great.  Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to set up and works flawlessly. Love the apps available for monitoring usage. I have one request though. My ISP periodically drops my connection. As far as I can tell, the diagnostic logs in the router don't show me that. They will show me which IP addresses are being accessed but there is no indication in the logs of when the connection is lost. That would be great to have.
customer_reviews.author: Alan L. Bull

customer_reviews.title: Lightning fast
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace a Netgear N900 that died after only 6 months use. So far, this router blows the Netgear out of the water. Way faster, easier to setup, and the Android app is by far more useful. If this router fails to last, I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: J.J. Koolaid

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Horrible - does not maintain network connection, and transmission distance is less than our router from 4 years ago
customer_reviews.author: D. H. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Improvement
customer_reviews.text: Since I needed a stronger signal to reach all the new devices I looked hard for a new unit. This Lynksys unit fit the bill. Now all my smart televisions, smart phones, I-Pads, etc. work great. I needed help with setup but the helpline was wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Webwar

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good one!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent router.!! Using it for a 3bedroom apt and have set it up in the living room. I get reception even outside the building! And it's stable, no breakups and restarting the router and such.. So far this router is performing extremely well...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it worked just fine in the living room
customer_reviews.text: I tried this router for three weeks. And to be honest, it worked just fine in the living room. Yet, the second I stepped in the bedroom, goodbye wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Person #1

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My prehistoric model has more signal strength than this model.
customer_reviews.author: Jharwell

customer_reviews.title: Great router
customer_reviews.text: It's a great upgrade from my old Wireless-N router. Great interface and easy set up. I love the ability to set parental controls. Using it in an apartment so I didn't need top of the line specs. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CoolPoet

customer_reviews.title: Randomly reboots
customer_reviews.text: Equipment never worked right - randomly reboots itself every few minutes. I've bought Linksys previously and have always been happy. I am in the process of returning it to Linksys; we'll see how the new one does.
customer_reviews.author: Philippe Beaudette

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great products. I have a two story home and there is only one dead spot. We upgraded to a netgear nighthawk and use this as an access point. Get 65 Mbps everywhere I am!!
customer_reviews.author: Collin E.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this hoping for better range inside my home
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping for better range inside my home. But behind one wall the signal drops to 50%. Lately I have to reset it from time to time to get the internet going on. On the plus side, the app in your smart phone is great and the disk support is very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This is more of an apartment router. Range is decent, but do not expect this router to cover more than 1000-1500 ft of living space very well. No drops in signal, easy setup.
customer_reviews.author: All Computer Services

customer_reviews.title: Great product, shipped on time
customer_reviews.text: Great product, shipped on time. packaging was good, works great. Our wireless range/speeds at our house are much better with this router (compared to our previous N router). Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Trash!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Do yourself a favor and stay away. I never could get this crap setup. Bought another brand and was up and running with blazing fast speeds!!
customer_reviews.author: A.W.

customer_reviews.title: Received a pre-owned router
customer_reviews.text: Despite the ad saying "new", the device as received appears to have been used with a configured SSID and a protected password. I managed to reset it to a factory default and successfully deployed it. However if I have known, I would have bought this device brand new from Sam's club at around the same price ($40) and a better warranty.
customer_reviews.author: bassarisk

customer_reviews.title: Bunch of nope. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Don’t buy. I think this one may be more Belkin crap than it was linksys due to the poor quality, overheating, terrible range but slightly decent setup. I have an echo with two TVs and a SmartThings but this router can’t handle upnp traffic hardly at all. My devices disconnect frequently and to top it all off I’m just outside the return window so I’m SOL. Sorry linksys you lost me after this one.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Linksys EA6400
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a router with an app, while this is an okay router the phone or tablet needs improvement. From time to time it freezes and locks up the router which them requires a reboot. Overall on a scale of 10, I would give it a 7
customer_reviews.author: Rastagirl

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Set up was easy and straight forward. Excellent range for me - through my whole house. Works great so far. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Beth S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This item came very promptly and works great.my modem is on the second floor oft home but a lot of what I do is on the first floor and so far it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Prisondoc

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and fast
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and fast. UI no brainer. Spend a few more $ now and save yourself from head aches later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazons First Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I expected it to be
customer_reviews.text: Better than what I expected it to be. A lot better range than I thought. Great price and delivery as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: We were having dropped signal issues with our previous router. No problems with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We have had the router in use for about four or five months now. It works well and has good range. No problem supporting an Xbox, streaming device and laptops all at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: BALDJIMBO

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: loving it the range is very good and I can stream video with no problems. it was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Martin

customer_reviews.title: very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: very nice product...Stable and was worth every penny i paid for it...Take out a protection plan i was offered one very cheap..
customer_reviews.author: yourMajestydaKing

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware: at least for the seller I purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware: at least for the seller I purchased from, Linksys technical support said their coverage had already expired for my device eventhough it arrived today...
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Works good, however the cd that came with the router ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good, however the cd that came with the router didn't have the directions in English. It was in about 30 other languages but not in English. Weird
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: The next AC1600 I bought was from eBay that one worked fine. I noticed the transfer speed increase immediately using ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit didn't work so I returned it to the Amazon seller for a refund. The next AC1600 I bought was from eBay that one worked fine. I noticed the transfer speed increase immediately using the AC wireless but the BEST feature was the USB port that acts as a network media server, I can manage my media files from my computer (transfer or delete) and play them on my smart media player. Now I don't have to run a media server program on my computer to reach my files with my TV. Truly Awesome. The setup for the media server option was not simple, I had to do a little research and trial and error.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W Antonucci

customer_reviews.title: AT&T gateway has better range and throughput
customer_reviews.text: AT&T gateway has better range and throughput. Opend up wifi on it just to get consistent bandwith. Only reason I keep it on the network is for parental controls.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Best router yet!!!
customer_reviews.text: Reliable and easy to install. Strong signal.Good for the money, I should say excellent! Great router money can buy!!! Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Edwin L. Rios

customer_reviews.title: Worked for less than 30 days, then it just ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for less than 30 days, then it just stopped working altogether. It won't even turn on anymore, Amazon won't accept the return because I missed the final return date by 4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Maria S

customer_reviews.title: canceled order
customer_reviews.text: I never used this product as the manufacture had been bought out by Belkin. This doesn't mean the product had problems, I just found another router that better suited my needs.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL GREENWOOD

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This has not been anywhere near the standards I expect to see from Linksys. It took 12 resets to finally get into the darn thing and then I still have not been able to get the wireless to work and actually provide connectivity to my wireless devices. It does provide connectivity via my hard wired devices but that is about it. I seem to have to refresh/powercycle this frequesntly as well which is also something I have not experienced before. Thinking I should have gone with the WRT1900
customer_reviews.author: Allen Lee Hall Jr

customer_reviews.title: Linksys router works good
customer_reviews.text: Great group D router for the price! Appreciate that I could purchase used for what I needed...Linksys is a very good router manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: S Suvalsky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than what I thought! with 3 difference wireless network.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great signal!
customer_reviews.text: Range is awesome on this. With a better modem, my download speeds tripled.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Wong

customer_reviews.title: One of the better units.
customer_reviews.text: Great performance. The new interface makes it easy for anyone to set up. We do a lot of streaming and this unit has very little drop out at higher speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Not very good range around the house
customer_reviews.text: Not very good range around the house. Our old router which was 9 years old when I bought this one got around the whole house better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I notice little difference with my n300 router and I still had to use extender.
customer_reviews.author: michael j darnell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value; great features
customer_reviews.text: Leading edge features; good price compared to other similar featured products. Installation is straightforward when hooking to cable input, however it is complicated when connecting to DSL (ATT). Most of the issues are on the DSL end , required phone support from ATT; would have liked access to a deeper explanation of these issues in a technical document from Linksys to anticipate/work through it. Have had no operating issues in one month since installation.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Schuette

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, even for $30 refurbished
customer_reviews.text: Dropped connections and slow read/write to attached USB 3.0 HDD over wireless AC. Linksys support was an absolute joke so I returned this and spent quite a bit more on a Netgear R6700 Nighthawk. The only thing this router had going for it was its price: $30 refurbished.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great Router
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it 20 days back. It works great. Good replacement for my old router. Highly recommended. If your PC or phone browser does not redirect to Guest Authentication page after connecting to Guest Network, turn off and On the Guest network. It fixes the problem. I am getting better speed at all my devices compare to my old router. Great Beamforming technology.
customer_reviews.author: Aswini Das

customer_reviews.title: Linksys Smart Wi-Fi router
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Mine was a really old "G" router that could not download videos. This one gives whole house access.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: NAT issues galore
customer_reviews.text: at first this router worked fine but after a week all my end devices would randomly lose connection to the Internet because of Nat conflicts and this router had to routinely be power cycled over and over again until I chose to buy a new one from D-link instead
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brown

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it has its ups and downs works ok one min and the next problams so its cheeper then Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D. Dankert

customer_reviews.title: I love the linksys router!
customer_reviews.text: it is great! Prior to having it our computer is really slow. Now it is a rocket! I love prime shipping! We get our items thw next day.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Faulhaber

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Price was right, set up was easy, and the machine works better than expected. There is a small business, and a gamer using the machine and still plenty of room for this retired individual. Highly recommend...
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ashley Seibert

customer_reviews.title: Great Router
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice little unit. It was very easy to set up, has a very good range, and sleek design.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of junk. Can't believe I bought two of these. Don't waste your money. They overheat and can't handle even light network loads. Way under built, way over priced. Junk Junk Junk Junk Junk. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the Linksys. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Connelly

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: after one year use, it's broken. so don't buy the warehouse devices...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Linksys AC1600 Wi-Fi Wireless Dual-Band+ Router with Gigabit & USB Ports, Smart Wi-Fi App Enabled to Control Your Network from Anywhere (EA6400)
product_meta.description: 4 x Antenna - ISM Band - UNII Band - 1300 Mbps Wireless Speed - 4 x Network Port - 1 x Broadband Port - USB Wall Mountable, Desktop
